TopicTitle: Request: a Tylo texture for TR

Articles.Content:
So I've finally gotten around to installing Texture Replacer, and loving it. I've played around with several texture packs and thoroughly enjoy every one. But there's one celestial body I can't seem to find a good texture for: Tylo. If somebody could make a good Tylo texture - preferably one based on a real solar system body map - I would very much appreciate it.

EDIT: Never mind, I found one.

Edited September 5, 2014 by Mitchz95
